title: Ikkyuu-san (Ikkyu the Little Monk)
synopsis: Ikkyu is a little boy training to be a monk at Ankokuji Temple. Known for being mischievous and a bit of a troublemaker, but also extremely smart, Ikkyu constantly thinks of new ways to outwit his frustrated teachers, helping others at the same time.
related_anime: ['Ikkyuu-san: Haru Da! Yancha Hime', 'Ikkyuu-san: Ooabare Yancha-hime', 'Congming de Yixiu Zhi Fan Dou Gongzhu', 'Ikkyuu-san to Yancha Hime']
staff: [['Yabuki, Kimio', ['Director']], ['Nitta, Yoshikata', ['Director']], ['Imazawa, Tetsuo', ['Episode Director']], ['Nagaki, Bonjin', ['Episode Director']]]
